personajes.name: My Melody
personajes.description: My Melody loves to bake cookies with her mom! And also, she plays the flute. Her cutepink hood was handmade!

personajes.name: Hello Kitty
personajes.description: Hello Kitty was born in the suburbs of London. Her hobbies include baking cookies and making new friends. As she always says, you can never have too many friends!

personajes.name: Kuromy
personajes.description: Kuromi keeps a secret diary and loves romance novels! Her favourite color is blackand she is the leader of a biker band.

personajes.name: cinammoroll
personajes.description: Cinnammoroll is actually a chubby dog! He loves soft and warm cinnamon rolls and has looong ears that help him fly.

personajes.name: My Melody
personajes.description: My Melody loves to bake cookies with her mom! And also, she plays the flute. Her cutepink hood was handmade!

personajes.name: Keroppi
personajes.description: Keroppi is a profesional trumpet player, who also enjoys baseball and spending time with his family. He's always with a smile in his face!

personajes.name: Pochacco
personajes.description: Pochacco's favourite icecream is banana flavoured! He loves when its spring so he can skateboard all day, sadly he's a little dumb.

personajes.name: Pompompurin
personajes.description: Pompompurin loves pudin, in all ways. He loves the phrase Let's go out! but hatesStay. Friends with anyone.
